name: God Of Shapes
description:
This is a game jam game made for Mini Jam 70: Heaven.

The jam's theme was "Heaven" and the limitation "The player must be an inanimate object".

You play as a cube who needs to destroy the shape world's current god, that happens to be a red circle, with your projectiles. "The boss" has 100  hit points and will shoot projectiles at you. Don't get hit as you only have 1 hit point. In addition to the boss, the room is filled with 4 turrets, where each one of them shoots 4 projectiles in 4 different directions, and explosive triangles, who will chase you down and kill you on their impact with you. Explosive triangles can also be killed with player's projectiles.
